spec_data.Name: perl-Catalyst-Plugin-ConfigLoader
spec_data.Description:
This module will attempt to load find and load a configuration file of
various types. Currently it supports YAML, JSON, XML, INI and Perl formats.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 08:48:39 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Load config files of various types
